title: Implementation of  Broadlands Hydropower Project
decision_details: - Broadlands site has been identified as a potential hydro-power site by the Ceylon Electricity Board and the government intends to implement this project immediately in order to reduce the cost of electricity generation by adding new hydro-power to the network.  85% of the total cost of the project of US$ 82 million is to be financed by China and the balance 15% by the government of  Sri Lanka.  The proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka to proceed with the project was approved by the Cabinet.
